mapper.insert: INSERT INTO deposit_details ( tenant_id, entry_date, batch_no, cash_detail_no, contract_no, contract_branch_no, application_no, due_date, total_premium_amount, deposit_amount, commission_withheld, compensation_tax, clearing_date, suspence_date, delete_date, cash_matching_date, cash_detail_status, payment_result_code, access_id, access_pass, comment, premium_due_date, premium_sequence_no, created_by ) VALUES ( #{tenantId}, #{entryDate}, #{batchNo}, #{cashDetailNo}, #{contractNo}, #{contractBranchNo}, #{applicationNo}, #{dueDate}, #{totalPremiumAmount}, #{depositAmount}, #{commissionWithheld}, #{compensationTax}, #{clearingDate}, #{suspenceDate}, #{deleteDate}, #{cashMatchingDate}, #{cashDetailStatus}, #{paymentResultCode}, #{accessId}, #{accessPass}, #{comment}, #{premiumDueDate}, #{premiumSequenceNo}, #{createdBy} )

INSERT INTO deposit_headers ( tenant_id, entry_date, batch_no, payment_method_code, deposit_date, received_amount, batch_total_amount, batch_status, comment, usere_id, collection_route, group_code, created_by ) VALUES ( #{tenantId}, #{entryDate}, #{batchNo}, #{paymentMethodCode}, #{depositDate}, #{receivedAmount}, #{batchTotalAmount}, #{batchStatus}, #{comment}, #{usereId}, #{collectionRoute}, #{groupCode}, #{createdBy} )
